第三十一戦隊で大型艦を南沙\n諸島まで護衛、さらに比島方\n面地上作戦を支援後、:
Escort large ships to the
Nansha Islands with the
31st Squadron, and after
supporting the operation
in the Philippines Area,
search and destroy enemy
submarines in the area!
潜水艦を基軸戦力とした第六\n艦隊をソロモン海域へ展開！\n第三艦隊と共に敵水上:
Deploy the 6th Fleet, with
submarines as its main
force, to the Solomon Sea!
Together with the 3rd Fleet,
control the enemy surface
forces, and capture and
destroy the enemy ships!
精鋭水雷戦隊により友軍陸上\n部隊への鼠輸送作戦を実施！\n同輸送を阻止せんとす:
With an elite torpedo
squadron, conduct a Rat
Transport Operation for
friendly land forces! If
you encounter an enemy
attempting to block this
transport, destroy it!
ラバウル空襲！ 遊撃部隊、出撃せり！:
Bombing of Rabaul!
Striking Force, Sortie!
ラバウル空襲！\n遊撃部隊、出撃せり！:
Bombing of Rabaul!
Striking Force, Sortie!
ラバウルに進出した遊撃部隊\nと基地航空隊、そして各艦隊\nを連携させ、敵攻勢を:
Coordinate the Strike Force,
land-based squadrons, and
fleets that have advanced to
Rabaul to intercept the
enemy offensive! Pay close
attention to enemy air raids!
第二次ルンガ沖夜戦:
Second Night Battle
off Lunga Point
いよいよソロモン方面に侵攻\nした敵戦力と雌雄を決する時\nが来た！我が最精鋭二:
The time has come for us to
face the enemy forces that
have invaded the Solomon
Islands! Launch our best and
brightest naval force! Carve
victory over Lunga's dawn!
第三十一戦隊、これよりマニラに入港す。: 31st Squadron, entering the Port of Manila!
第三十一戦隊、これよりマニラを抜錨、\nルソン方面に出撃す！:
31st Squadron, setting sail from Manilla,
sortieing to the Luzon front!
ソロモン最前線へ、鼠輸送を敢行する！:
To the front lines of the Solomons,
carrying out a Rat Transport Operation!
第三艦隊、出撃する！対空警戒を厳に！:
3rd Fleet, sortieing!
Maintain high anti-aircraft alert!
二水戦、鉄底海峡に突入する！合戦用意！:
DesRon2, entering Iron Bottom Strait!
Battle stations!
敵巡洋艦部隊、発見！揚陸止め！\n全軍、戦闘準備！突撃せよ！:
Enemy cruiser force spotted!
Stop the landing!
All troops, prepare for battle! Charge!
大規模艦隊の……応急修理に適した泊地です。:
This is... a suitable anchorage
for emergency repairs on large fleets.
これより敵補給船団を捜索、撃滅する！\n敵の兵站を遮断する！:
Now proceeding to search and destroy
the enemy supply convoy!
Cut off the enemy's supply lines!
対水上、対空、それぞれ見張りを厳とせよ！:
Be on high alert
for surface and air threats!
我が艦隊は、これより敵艦隊を撃滅する！\n対水上見張りを厳に！合戦用意！艦隊、突:
Our fleet will now destroy the enemy fleet.
Stay on high alert for surface threats!
Battle stations! Fleet, move in!
